mapper.select: SELECT SUM(DP.POINT_GET) - SUM(DP.POINT_USE) AS "TOTAL_POINT" FROM DR_USER DU JOIN DR_POINT DP ON DU.USER_NUMBER = DP.USER_NUMBER WHERE DU.USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} -- 현재 로그인 한 회원

SELECT DPH.PHOTO_LOCAL, DP.PRODUCT_NAME, DP.PRODUCT_PRICE, STOCK.PRODUCT_COUNT FROM DR_PRODUCT DP JOIN DR_PHOTO DPH ON DP.PRODUCT_NUMBER = DPH.PRODUCT_NUMBER JOIN (SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, COUNT(PRODUCT_NUMBER) AS PRODUCT_COUNT FROM DR_PRODUCT GROUP BY PRODUCT_NAME) STOCK ON DP.PRODUCT_NAME = STOCK.PRODUCT_NAME GROUP BY DPH.PHOTO_LOCAL, DP.PRODUCT_NAME, DP.PRODUCT_PRICE, STOCK.PRODUCT_COUNT ORDER BY DP.PRODUCT_PRICE
SELECT PRODUCT_CODE FROM DR_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = #{pointShopDTO.productName} -- 유저가 선택한 상품 AND ROWNUM <= #{pointShopDTO.quantity} -- 유저가 입력한 갯수
SELECT USER_PHONE FROM DR_USER WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} -- 현재 로그인 한 회원
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DR_POINT (POINT_NUMBER, POINT_NOTE, POINT_USE, USER_NUMBER) VALUES (SEQ_POINT_NUMBER.NEXTVAL, '상품구매', #{totalCost}, #{userNumber})
